comment: I had the pleasure to take this class online and all I have to say is Professor Parks is a really nice guy. Quizzes every week (found online) and two tests (answers online too). There is a group project but it is not hard and he gives you a lot of time to get it done. I would take him again in a heartbeat.
He was a great online professor. Tests were easy when you study the powerpoints. Easy grader. Am taking him again this upcoming semester for another class.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class--Clear grading criteria
